channel.title: Modpack Tips on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in Modpack Tips on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Skyfactory 3
item.description: Note This list is current as of the time of writing this but might not always be up-to-date. Take advice here with that knoweldge. Important Rules Our Skyfactory 3 server follows all global rules that are appliciable to all of our other servers and has a couple additional rules. You can find our global rules on our wiki and at /spawn. You can have a max of 4 of each chicken.
